title: Another Script Font
content:
Can anyone point me toward something close to this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822180039im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CCI03132014_4463.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [CCI03132014.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822180039/http:/typophile.com/files/CCI03132014.jpg) | 60.95 KB |
author: wannab1

comments.content: See Harold Lohner's Empress and Keepsake [Monograms fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822180039/http:/haroldsfonts.com/groups/monograms/#). Note that if you follow his link to Font Bros you can view a PDF that shows in far more detail the glyphs and how they work together.
